reviewText: Danae Elon has an approach to her films. She wants to learn absolutely everything about her topic and is willing to travel anywhere and speak to anyone in order to get information. You'll learn a lot. "Partly Private" was easy to watch. Nice scenes. Well-edited.

Total trash. Danae tries to give the impression that she is truly seeking information about male genital cutting. Phillipe is a demon in carnate. Danae ends up mutilating her second son's genitals. Phillipe and Danae are truly sick... particularly Phillipe.

She mutilated the genitals of her helpless infant son at the end. Infant circumcision IS genital mutilation, and it IS a violation of human rights, just the same as genital mutilation of girls. And don't you dare tell me, "Their genital mutilation of children (girls) is a human rights violation, but OUR genital mutilation of children (boys) is for health!" ALL children, whether female, male, or intersex, deserve to be protected from genital mutilation.
This movie is a wonderful, informative, funny film. A Very well done documentary movie from Ms. Elon who is a talented filmmaker
